content:
Our team at @globaldev are producing some superb in-depth articles right now. 

Whatever your level of Ruby you'll learn something from @matsadler 's [Ruby Tips](http://globaldev.co.uk/2013/09/ruby-tips-part-1/)  which follows his epic [Ruby 2.0.0 in Detail](http://globaldev.co.uk/2013/03/ruby-2-0-0-in-detail/) from earlier in the year.

Meanwhile @james_allardice delves into the many changes in [ECMAScript 6](http://globaldev.co.uk/2013/09/es6-part-1/) (aka JavaScript). The days of rollover JS are long gone.
